'''Reed Miller''' is the founder of the [[Treasure Hoarders]], defining them as "an organization of mutual cooperation."<ref>{{Ref/Enemy|Treasure Hoarders|handbook=1}}</ref>

He was a legendary thief, infamous throughout the nations, who yearned to create "a world without boundaries," and buried some kind of "great treasure" in in what eventually became [[Nod-Krai]] which is also where he founded the Treasure Hoarders. And was excuted for his crimes <ref>[[Song of the Welkin Moon]]</ref><ref name=":0">{{Ref/ArtiSet|page=Lightkeeper's Pledge}}</ref>

He was a childhood friend of the original Torchforger and shared the dream of a <nowiki>''</nowiki>[[Nod-Krai|paradise]]<nowiki>''</nowiki> with him. <ref name=":0" />
